long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pickles is a Chrome extension that saves the information of currently open tabs.
It can read information of open tabs and save it in the browser.

What the Pickles can do
- It can save the information of the currently open tabs.
- Saved tabs information can be referenced or deleted at any time.
- It can download tabs information in CSV format.
- It can download tabs infomation in Markdown format.
- It can copy tabs infomation to the clipboard in Markdown format.
